about.title: About Me
about.description:
My path to design began in childhood - drawing and designing diaries was my main hobby. As a teenager, I experimented with forum design, creating designs and implementing ideas in Photoshop.

While studying at college, I was lucky enough to start working as a junior designer in a printing house. From that moment on, I began my professional path.

Today, I live in Israel and dream of making the world "tomorrow" even more beautiful and understandable than "today". In addition to my main specialization - print design and prepress, I plunged into the world of UX / UI, which undoubtedly only expands my capabilities in achieving my goals.

My skills: branding and corporate identity, UX / UI design, print design, prepress.
